headline: Textron Contract Win And Record Revenue Raise Questions On Durability
summary: Textron (NYSE:TXT) secured a $163.4 million contract to supply Mobile Strike Force Vehicles to Ukraine. The company reported record annual revenue alongside momentum in its Aviation and Bell segments. Bell's MV-75 program moved production ahead of schedule, signaling operational progress across the defense portfolio. Textron, trading at $87.82, has delivered a 14.6% return over the past year and an 86.8% return over the past five years, reflecting steady investor interest in NYSE:TXT. The...
